capability.name: Customer Agreement
capability.definition: This service domain maintains the master customer agreement/legal contract. Note that a customer can be a complex corporate entity with many subsidiaries operating in different geopolitical areas. The customer agreement is linked to as many Sales Product Agreements as needed for all in-force products
capability.role: The Customer Agreement service domain captures and maintains the master legal terms of conditions in force for a customer (which as noted can be a complex multinational with many underlying product and service specific agreements).
capability.example: An new customer's master agreement is established prior to negotiating and setting up the underlying product specific agreements

key_features.name: Set-up and maintain the customer master agreement
key_features.description: Enables set-up and maintain the customer master agreement to support this service domain maintains the master customer agreement/legal contract

key_features.name: Ensure legal, regulatory and corporate considerations are covered in agreement
key_features.description: Enables ensure legal, regulatory and corporate considerations are covered in agreement to support this service domain maintains the master customer agreement/legal contract

key_features.name: Determine if proposed actions are covered by the agreement
key_features.description: Enables determine if proposed actions are covered by the agreement to support this service domain maintains the master customer agreement/legal contract
